news.title: Chip stocks rally to start 2026 after third-straight winning year
news.description: Investors piled into the winning artificial intelligence-adjacent sector following another big year of gains.

news.title: SpaceX stock debut is the big market event of 2026. Why Musk's venture could be biggest IPO ever
news.description: Investors have already thrown their weight behind the company ahead of its planned IPO.

news.title: Berkshire Hathaway shares dip as Warren Buffett exits and Greg Abel era begins
news.description: Investors digested the formal end of Warren Buffett's six-decade tenure as chief executive and the start of a new era under successor Greg Abel.

news.title: Tesla reports 418,227 deliveries for the fourth quarter, down 16%
news.description: Tesla's fourth-quarter deliveries report follows a steep rally in the company's stock in the last few months of 2025.

news.title: Ilya Lichtenstein, Bitcoin hacker behind massive crypto theft, credits Trump for early prison release
news.description: Ilya Lichtenstein had been sentenced to five years in prison after pleading guilty and admitting to the hack of crypto assets valued in the billions of dollars.

news.title: Want a way to trade this snowy, harsh winter? There are stocks for that
news.description: A colder-than-normal winter could spell opportunities for machinery manufacturers such as Douglas Dynamics.

news.title: S&P 500 wavers in first trading day of 2026 as chip stocks struggle to lift the whole market: Live updates
news.description: The S&P 500 seesawed on Friday, the first trading day of 2026, as gains in semiconductor names tried keep the index afloat.

news.title: Trump says U.S. will intervene if Iran 'violently kills' protestors
news.description: Protests erupted last week over the government's handling of a sharp fall in the nation's currency and soaring prices.

news.title: Why bitcoin is ending 2025 with losses, and whether it can rebound in the new year
news.description: Bitcoin could gain ground in 2026, despite its poor performance this year, according to some analysts on Wall Street.

news.title: Norway wraps up 2025 with 96% of its new car market fully electric, and Tesla's sales are surging there
news.description: Almost all new cars sold in Norway last year were fully electric, according to registration data published Friday.

news.title: Behind the mesh curtain: Why airline class wars will intensify in 2026
news.description: Airlines are continuing their focus on premium travelers, adding lounges, new first-class cabins and other perks for customers willing to spend more to fly.

news.title: Orsted files legal challenge over Trump's halt to $5 billion offshore wind project
news.description: Shares of Orsted, the world's largest developer of offshore wind farms, rose more than 4% on the news.

news.title: Economist Mark Zandi sees the Fed surprising with three rate cuts in first half of 2026
news.description: Markets and Fed officials themselves see only modest easing in the year ahead.

news.title: Gas prices fall to four-year lows as millions embark on holiday road trips
news.description: The average price of unleaded gasoline in the U.S. is at its lowest since 2021, according to AAA.

news.title: Trust these numbers? Economists see a lot of flaws in delayed CPI report showing downward inflation
news.description: Thursday saw the release of a much lighter-than-expected inflation report for November, and economists are already questioning its significance.

news.title: November consumer prices rose at a 2.7% annual rate, lower than expected, delayed data shows
news.description: Economists polled by Dow Jones expected CPI to have risen 3.1% on an annualized basis.

news.title: Bank of England cuts interest rates, in welcome Christmas boost for consumers
news.description: The Bank of England voted to cut interest rates from 4% to 3.75% in its last monetary policy move of 2025.

news.title: November's inflation report is the first to be released after the shutdown. Here's what to expect
news.description: November's CPI report is expected to show the annual inflation rate at 3.1%, according to economists polled by Dow Jones.

news.title: Musk's Grok AI bot says it's fixing safeguard 'lapses' after posting of sexualized images of children
news.description: Users on X raised concerns over explicit content of minors being generated using Musk's Grok tool.

news.title: Buffett hands over the reins, the stock market's losing streak, airline class wars and more in Morning Squawk
news.description: Here are five key things investors need to know to start the trading day.

news.title: China’s BYD overtakes Tesla as world’s top EV seller for the first time
news.description: The milestone caps an extraordinary rise for BYD, a company Tesla's Elon Musk once dismissed by laughing at their products.
